alert.note: Alert for Benton; Camden; Hickory; Laclede; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 16 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Residual flooding caused by earlier heavy rainfall is expected to continue. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Benton, Camden, Hickory and Pulaski. In southwest Missouri, Laclede. * WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated previous heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding will continue within the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Wet Glaize at Carrol Cave Road, Little Niangua at County Road 66, Deer Creek at Highway V, Rainy Creek at Knobby Road and Little Niangua at County Road 200. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Camdenton, Warsaw, Macks Creek, Linn Creek, Cross Timbers, Climax Springs, Barnumton and Branch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
